name: A Hero With A Sword
description:
An adventure action 2D game, where you play as a hero who fights demons and ghosts and fight his way to the castle.

How to play: arrows: moves, space: jump, ctrl: attack, enter: replay, esc: quit, can be played with controllers.

hope you enjoy it, and thanks for playing.
